thread.title: Kyrie Irving hit a clutch 3 eerily reminiscent of his NBA Finals game-winner
thread.title_full: Kyrie Irving hit a clutch 3 eerily reminiscent of his NBA Finals game-winner

author: Kofie Yeboah
title: Kyrie Irving hit a clutch 3 eerily reminiscent of his NBA Finals game-winner
text:
He did it again
In one of the most exciting games of the NBA season, Kyrie Irving hit a clutch three against the Wizards with a move that looks eerily familiar. 
Where have we seen this before?
Yup.
This is like in the game NBA Ballers where your character has a hotspot icon on the court.
Looks like we know where Kyrie Irvingâ€™s spot would be if they ever brought the game back.
I miss NBA Ballers.
